name: Create and Link Indicator from Alert
description: Creates and links indicators when an Alert is created.

steps.name: Do Not Create Source IP Indicator
Correlate File Hash and Process Name Indicators
Create New Indicator Record for Processname
Do Not Create Destination IP Indicator

routes.name: Identify Type of Hash -> Create New SHA256 Indicator
routes.label: SHA256

routes.name: Get Linked Incidents -> Does Alert have Hash
Find Existing Processname Indicator -> Was Processname Indicator Found
Does Alert have IP Address -> Find Existing IP Address Indicators
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Was File Hash Indicator Found -> Update Existing File Hash Indicator
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Get Linked Incidents -> Does Alert have URL
Start -> Get Linked Incidents
Was URL Indicator Found -> Updating Existing URL Indicator
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Get Linked Incidents -> Does Alert have Processname
Was IP Address Indicator Found -> Set IP variables
routes.label: No

routes.name: Find Existing URL Indicators -> Was URL
Does Alert have Processname -> Find Existing Processname Indicator
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Set Process Name IRI -> Correlate File Hash and Process Name Indicators
Create New SHA256 Indicator -> Set Process Name IRI
Is Destination IP Private -> Copy  of Create IP Address Indicator
routes.label: No

routes.name: Is Source IP Private -> Do Not Create Source IP Indicator
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Create New SHA1 Indicator -> Set Process Name IRI
Does Alert have Hash -> No File Hash
routes.label: No

routes.name: Was File Hash Indicator Found -> Identify Type of Hash
routes.label: No

routes.name: Create New Indicator Record for Processname -> Set Process Name IRI
Is Destination IP Private -> Copy  of Do Not Create Source IP Indicator
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Update Existing Processname Indicator -> Set Process Name IRI
Destination IP Private IPspace Check -> Copy  of Is Source IP Private
Was URL Indicator Found -> Create New URL Indicator
routes.label: No

routes.name: Was Processname Indicator Found -> Update Existing Processname Indicator
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Get Linked Incidents -> Does Alert have IP Address
Does Alert have URL -> Find Existing URL Indicators
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Find Existing IP Address Indicators -> Was IP Address Indicator Found
Find Existing File Hash Indicators -> Was File Hash Indicator Found
Does Alert have Processname -> No Processname
routes.label: No

routes.name: Create New MD5 Indicator -> Set Process Name IRI
Does Alert have URL -> No URL
routes.label: No

routes.name: Does Alert have Hash -> Find Existing File Hash Indicators
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Is Source IP Private -> Create IP Address Indicator
routes.label: No

routes.name: Identify Type of Hash -> Create New SHA1 Indicator
routes.label: SHA1

routes.name: Set File Hash IRI -> Correlate File Hash and Process Name Indicators
Set IP variables -> Destination IP Private IPspace Check
Identify Type of Hash -> Create New MD5 Indicator
routes.label: MD5

routes.name: Update Existing File Hash Indicator -> Set Process Name IRI
Does Alert have IP Address -> No IP Address
routes.label: No

routes.name: Source IP Private IPspace Check -> Is Source IP Private
Was Processname Indicator Found -> Create New Indicator Record for Processname
routes.label: No

routes.name: Was IP Address Indicator Found -> Update Existing IP Address Indicator
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Set IP variables -> Is Source IP Private
